title: What can I do if my phone can't play online music or videos?
answer:
Follow the onscreen instructions to install the Adobe Flash Player plug-in before you play the online music or video.

If the problem persists, perform the following operations:

Open the browser, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144821710001.png) > **Settings** > **Advanced** > **Enable plug-ins**, and choose **Always on**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144822164002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144823361003.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144824421004.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144824917005.jpg)  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144824981006.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
